safetyTips: We are adhering to all government guidelines regarding Covid-19.
name: FILLING HAPPY
address: Personal address blackthorn way, Ashford, TN23
description: We are an Eco-friendly refill delivery service. We want to make it easier for local people to reduce their plastic waste by refilling bottles. We mostly supply essentials for your laundry, kitchen and bathroom, we  try our hardest to source sustainable, ethical and UK produced items where ever possible.  We are only able to deliver to TN23 and TN23 postcodes. Order via the website.
